translations: n．喃喃自语者：指那些低声抱怨、嘟囔或说话含糊不清的人。
· The audience was filled with mutterers who were unhappy with the performance.
观众席上充满了对表演不满的喃喃自语者。

sentences.sentence: The bag-toters and mutterers who spend all their time there? “Sometimes I get angry at the dictionary and let loose with a muffled yell.”
sentences.translation: 有时他会对着词典发怒，并大声叫喊。
